.. _install_requirements:

============
Requirements
============
* `PHP <http://www.php.net>`_ 5.6 *(production)*, `PHP <http://www.php.net>`_ 7 *(development)*
* `Composer <https://getcomposer.org>`_ for PHP
* `NodeJS <https://nodejs.org>`_ >= 6.11.4
* `NPM <https://nodejs.org>`_ >= 5.3
* `Gulp <https://gulpjs.com>`_ >= 3.9.0
  
  * ``npm install -g gulp``
* `Typings <https://www.npmjs.com/package/typings>`_ >= 1.3.0
  
  * ``npm install -g typings``
* `TypeScript <https://www.typescriptlang.org>`_ >= 2.2.2
  
  * ``npm install -g typescript``


Development
-----------
* `Vagrant <https://www.vagrantup.com>`_
* `VirtualBox <https://www.virtualbox.org>`_

Production
----------
* `Ubuntu Server <https://www.ubuntu.com>`_ 14.04
* `Nginx <https://www.nginx.com>`_
* `Apache Cassandra <http://cassandra.apache.org>`_ >= 3.2
* `RabbitMQ <https://www.rabbitmq.com>`_ 
* `OpenSSL <https://www.openssl.org>`_
* `Elastic Search <https://www.elastic.co/products/elasticsearch>`_ >= 5.6

Optional Components
-------------------
* `MongoDB <https://www.mongodb.com>`_ *(for boost)*
* `Neo4j <https://neo4j.com>`_ 2.2 or greater *(for discovery)*
* `Redis <https://redis.io>`_ *(for pubsub, live and caching)*
